Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We have sequenced the expressed exons of the C6 gene from selected cases and have found three molecular defects leading to total deficiency 879delG , which is the common defect in the Cape and hitherto unreported , and 1195delC and 1936delG , which have been previously reported in African - Americans .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Total deficiency of C6 due to 879delG |
| Total deficiency of C6 due to 1195delC |
| Total deficiency of C6 due to 1936delG |

These entities represent the specific molecular defects of the C6 gene leading to total deficiency of the C6 protein.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Total deficiency of C6 due to 879delG |
| Total deficiency of C6 due to 1195delC |
| Total deficiency of C6 due to 1936delG |

These entities represent specific genetic mutations (deletions) of the C6 gene that result in total deficiency of the C6 protein.
